instructions.visual_style: Cinematic, modern, short depth of field, warm lighting
constraints: Focus on facial expressions and sleek UI

scenes.visual_prompt: Close-up of a diverse professional looking confused and slightly embarrassed while holding a business card. Blurry background of a networking event. Cinematic lighting.
scenes.narration_japanese: 「顔はわかるのに、名前が出ない…」

scenes.visual_prompt: Close-up of a hand holding a modern smartphone. The screen displays a sleek, dark-themed glowing profile picture of a person with colorful floating nodes around them. No text visible on the screen, just abstract UI elements.
scenes.narration_japanese: そんな時こそ、「anoano」の出番です。

scenes.visual_prompt: Fast dynamic montage: The person on the smartphone screen tapping floating colorful abstract tags (resembling hashtags). The confused professional's face suddenly brightens up with an 'Aha!' expression.
scenes.narration_japanese: タグとエピソードで、人の記憶を瞬時に引き出す。

scenes.visual_prompt: Two professionals smiling and shaking hands warmly in clear focus. A glowing brain icon briefly subtly animates in the center of the screen before fading out. High quality, photorealistic.
scenes.narration_japanese: 記憶をつなぐ新感覚メモ、anoano。

audio_guidance.background_music: Subtle, modern electronic beat building up to a positive, resolving chord at the end.
audio_guidance.voice_over_tone: Empathetic at first, transitioning to confident and warm.
